long_description: The Arc'teryx Theta AR women's jacket is a fully featured GORE-TEX(R) Pro storm shelter with clean styling and multisport versatility. Theta AR is the longest length offered by Arc'teryx and provides maximum coverage. Made from lightweight, supple GORE-TEX 3L Pro fabric, Theta AR is completely waterproof and windproof, and offers excellent breathability. Helmet-compatible Drop Hood(TM) with laminated brim and fast adjustment rotates with your head. High collar for wind protection when hood is down; laminated chin guard offers comfort against skin. Watertight front zipper with inner laminated windflap ensures total weatherproofing. Watertight external zippers, including pit zips, are highly water resistant. Storage options include dual handwarmer pockets and sleeve pocket with laminated zippers. Articulated elbows and no-lift, gusseted underarms ensure a comfortable fit. Dropped rear hem offers full seat coverage. Adjustable waist and hem drawcords; die-cut, laminated rip-and-stick wrist closures. Engineered for performance, the Arc'teryx Theta AR features an athletic fit with room for layering underneath.
short_description: The Arc'teryx Theta AR women's jacket is a fully featured GORE-TEX(R) Pro storm shelter with clean styling and multisport versatility.
